text: Which of the following is true of a parliamentary system of government?

explanation:
A parliamentary system of government means that the executive branch of government has the direct or indirect support of the parliament. This support is usually shown by a vote of confidence. text: The anonymity in the civil service means that a civil servant

options.A: is above the law of the land
options.C: should take part in partisan politics

explanation:

The advice they give needs to be given to ministers both freely and also without fear of adverse public or political reactions and without fear of future career damage.

text: Local governments  are established to

options.B: give more powers to the traditional rulers

It is not about giving more powers to traditional rulers, diminishing loyalty to the central government, or encouraging central government interference in local affairs.
